# Getting Started

Welcome to Test Project! This guide will help you get started quickly.

## Installation

```bash
npm install test-project
```

## Quick Start

Here's a simple example:

```javascript
import { hello } from 'test-project';

hello('world');
```

## Next Steps

- Read the [Installation Guide](./installation)
- Check out the examples
